name: Zombie jokers 2
description:
Zombie jokers 2 is an arcade game where you have to survive in different locations with zombie ! You can improve the speed of your character, as well as buy him a more powerful gun! Each time, the number of zombies increases. In the game you will have to shoot different zombies.

The game has:
1) Several variations of weapons. (Starting with pistols ending with a machine gun)
2) The ability to equip the player in armor.
3) The ability to pump player's characteristics. (Dexterity, speed, immunity)
4) With each time zombies become more aggressive.
5) Your equipment also affects the speed of your player!
